subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: N.H.R.A. Fall Nationals at Texas Motorplex
lead_paragraph: The drag-racing star John Force was alert and conscious after sustaining serious injuries in a wreck with his Funny Car rival Kenny Bernstein during the N.H.R.A. Fall Nationals at Texas Motorplex in Ennis. The team spokesman Elon Werner said the 58-year-old Force broke his left ankle and his left wrist and sustained a severe abrasion to his right knee.
